name: Invictus Search
description: The current operating environment demands agile leaders that not only help your organization survive but thrive. They exhibit agility in terms of introducing new ways of working and pivoting rapidly to new operating models for the business. Crisis tested leaders will develop a tolerance for ambiguity, enhance collaboration and communication across the organization and introduce a culture of constant review, refinement and improvement. Partner with Invictus Search to identify these leaders for your organization.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: TALENT FOR TRANSFORMATION
ShortDescription: Invictus Search is a global executive search firm headquartered in Singapore. Run by a seasoned business and Finance leader, we focus on assisting our clients in the Agriculture, Food and FMCG industries to source leaders with a proven track record of delivering value in today's volatile environment
enhanced_description: Invictus Search is a global executive search firm headquartered in Singapore, founded in 2020 and led by a seasoned business and Finance leader. They specialize in identifying agile, crisis-tested leaders for organizations, particularly within the Agriculture, Food, and FMCG industries. These leaders are adept at introducing new ways of working, pivoting rapidly to new operating models, enhancing collaboration and communication, and fostering a culture of constant review, refinement, and improvement. Invictus Search aims to help organizations not only survive but thrive in today's volatile environment by sourcing top executive talent and further developing them through leadership assessments and executive coaching services.
key_use_cases: Sourcing and identifying agile and crisis-tested executive leaders for critical roles
Conducting leadership assessments to evaluate executive potential and fit
Providing executive coaching to enhance leadership capabilities and organizational performance
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity in executive recruitment
Accelerating the hiring of top executive talent
competitive_advantages: Specialization in identifying agile and crisis-tested executive leaders for transformational roles
Deep expertise and focus within the Agriculture, Food, and FMCG industries
Comprehensive leadership solutions including executive search, assessments, and coaching
Led by a seasoned business and Finance leader providing unique insight
roi_benefits: Enhanced organizational resilience and growth through agile leadership
Increased efficiency and speed in executive hiring
Improved hiring manager confidence and productivity
Access to top-tier executive talent capable of delivering value in volatile environments
